title: Munis Need to Manage Fed Chair’s Views: BI's Gastall
description: Matthew Gastall, head of municipal strategy and research for Bloomberg Intelligence, joins "Bloomberg Real Yield". A new Fed chair has sweeping implications for markets, especially municipals. The dichotomy between continued policy accommodation and a potential push for balance-sheet reduction has reignited debate over the yield curve's trajectory. (Source: Bloomberg)
